Sentencas: Accidental reoxidation is one of the most critical issues of SOFC anodes, leading to performance degradation or even producing catastrophic failure of the cell.
Titulo: Redox-cycling studies of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work several redox cycling experiments over microtubular SOFC cells are reported.
Titulo: Redox-cycling studies of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Oxidation kinetic parameters have been determined for this geometry by Thermogravimetric Analysis (TGA).
Titulo: Redox-cycling studies of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Oxidation kinetics is known to be diffusion limited at typical operation conditions and, for this reason, strictly dependant on geometry.
Titulo: Redox-cycling studies of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A linear relationship was found between expansion kinetics and damage on SOFC anodes in a series of dilatometric experiments for the same temperature.
Titulo: Redox-cycling studies of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A microtubular Ni-YSZ/YSZ/LSM-YSZ cell was also redox cycled several times at partial oxidation conditions (22% oxidation) and performance degradation was measured by j-V characterization and the loss was found to be approximately 2% in performance per cycle.
Titulo: Redox-cycling studies of anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells
